title: Dogdoughbarkfest: Sonic Drive-In with Matt Apodaca
itunes:title: Dogdoughbarkfest: Sonic Drive-In with Matt Apodaca
description:
Matt Apodaca (What's With These Homies Talkin' About Weezer, How Did This Get Played?) joins the 'boys to kick off Dogdoughbarkfest with a review of Sonic Drive-In. Plus, another edition of Let Me Be Frank.

Sources for this week's intro:

https://www.polygon.com/22522603/yuji-naka-retire-balan-wonderworld-sales-reviews-square-enix

https://sega.fandom.com/wiki/Sonic_the_Hedgehog_(series) https://www.okhistory.org/learn/sonic

https://www.mashed.com/125843/the-untold-truth-of-sonic-drive-in/ https://corporate.sonicdrivein.com/history/

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
